mapper.select: select id, uid, retried, flag from user_detail where flag = #{flag} limit ${common.user.detail.bulk};
select id from user_detail where uid = #{uid};
mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into user_detail(uid, nick_name, sex, create_date) values(#{uid}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{create});
mapper.update: update user_detail set nick_name = #{nickName}, sex = #{sex}, birth = #{birth}, create_date = #{create}, address = #{address}, college = #{college}, memo = #{memo}, flag = true where uid = #{uid};
update user_detail set retried = #{retried}, flag = #{flag} where id = #{id}
